span.em: "Developing the future one student at a time"

p.span: The mission of Buckingham County Public Schools is to cultivate
successful citizens by creating a safe, positive learning environment where
all students and staff can adapt, create, collaborate, think critically and
meet the challenges of an ever-changing society

a.title: Link to Letter from Dr. Hicks

p.style: line-height: 1.8; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 12pt 0px 0pt; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px; text-align: center;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: latobold; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Droid Sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Kindergarten registration is now online. If your child is currently enrolled in the BCPS Pre-K program you are NOT required to register them for Kindergarten. You will be receiving information to update your childs file in the mail the week of April 30th. If your child is not registered in the BCPS Pre-K, you will need to click the link below to begin the online registration process. Once the online portion has been completed, you will need to submit all required documents (list of required documentation below) to Buckingham Primary to complete the registration. Documentation may be placed in the drop box outside the Buckingham Primary Office doors or mailed to the address below. If you have any questions please contact the school at 434-505-0001.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Droid Sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Droid Sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Droid Sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Droid Sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Droid Sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Required documentation: Copies of 2 proofs of residency (e.g. drivers license, utility bill, rental agreement), birth certificate, physical examination report (must be dated within 12 months of the first day of school), and immunization record (immunizations must be up to date)

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Droid Sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

br.span: Preschool applications are available at the link below or you may call 434-969-6100 to have the preschool application mailed to you. Please return the application and copies of all required preschool registration documents to:

a.title: Link to Buckingham Preschool Application Form

br.span: Some of our teachers have made short videos to their students to let them know they are thinking about them and to encourage them during this stressful time. Click on the link below to access the videos.

div.div: We are excited to announce that we have extended our WiFi outside of each school building. Click on the Read More link for details.
div.a: Read More about Extended WiFi Outside School Buildings

a.title: Free and Reduced Price Meals Information

div.a: Free and Reduced Price Meals Information
div.div: Please be reminded that if you are interested in applying for free or reduced price meals, you may click on Read More below to access the application. If you have any questions, please contact Julie David at 434-969-6100 Ext. 103.

div.p: Buckingham County Public Schools does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district's activities and programs. Buckingham County Public Schools also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
